availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: R. H. Simmons, Jr (Muhlenberg County, Kentucky, merchant)

body.p: Muhlenberg County, Kentucky, merchant. Kentucky native. Son of R. H. Simmons, Sr. Married to Malissa J. Craig Simmons in Muhlenberg County on May 9, 1864. Merchant in Muhlenberg County in 1863.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Muhlenberg, Subdivision 2, p. 261B. Kentucky Birth, Marriage, and Death Records, KDLA, Roll #000557317, Muhlenberg County Marriages, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky. Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Muhlenberg County, KY, July and August 1863, p. 32, (Accessed via ancestry.com). Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records â€“ Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Rolls #994051, Muhlenberg County Deaths, p. unknown.
